00056 #ifndef INDRI_COMBINER_HPP
00057 #define INDRI_COMBINER_HPP
00058 
00059 #include <iostream>
00060 #include <vector>
00061 #include <string>
00062 #include "indri/Buffer.hpp"
00063 #include "indri/HashTable.hpp"
00064 
00065 class Combiner {
00066 private:
00067   std::vector< std::ofstream* > _docBucketFiles;
00068   std::vector< std::ofstream* > _linkBucketFiles;
00069   std::vector< std::stringstream* > _docBuckets;
00070   std::vector< std::stringstream* > _linkBuckets;
00071   int _bins;
00072 
00073   struct strhash {
00074   public:
00075     int operator() ( const char* k ) const {
00076       int hash = 0;
00077       for( ; *k; k++ ){
00078         hash *= 7;
00079         hash += *k;
00080       }
00081       return hash;
00082     }
00083   };
00084 
00085   struct strcompst {
00086   public:
00087     int operator () ( const char* o, const char* t ) const {
00088       return strcmp( o, t );
00089     }
00090   };
00091 
00092   struct url_entry {
00093     char* url;
00094     char* corpusPath;
00095     char* docNo;
00096     int linkCount;
00097     Buffer linkinfo;
00098 
00099     void addLink( const char* linkDocUrl,
00100                   const char* linkText )
00101     {
00102       if( linkinfo.position() ) {
00103         // remove trailing 0
00104         linkinfo.unwrite(1);
00105       }
00106 
00107       int docUrlLen = strlen(linkDocUrl);
00108       int textLen = strlen(linkText);
00109 
00110       int total = docUrlLen + sizeof "LINKFROM=" +
00111                   textLen + sizeof "TEXT=" + 1;
00112 
00113       sprintf( linkinfo.write(total),
00114                "LINKFROM=%s\nTEXT=%s\n",
00115                linkDocUrl,
00116                linkText );
00117 
00118       linkCount++;
00119     }
00120   };
00121 
00122   typedef HashTable<char*, url_entry*, strhash, strcompst> UrlEntryTable;
00123   typedef HashTable<char*, std::vector<url_entry*>, strhash, strcompst> UrlEntryVectorTable;
00124 
00125   url_entry* _newUrlEntry( char* url, char* corpusPath, char* docNo );
00126   void _deleteUrlEntry( void* buffer );
00127   
00128   void _openWriteBuckets( std::vector<std::stringstream*>& buffers, std::vector<std::ofstream*>& buckets, const std::string& path, int bins );
00129   void _flushWriteBuffer( std::vector<std::stringstream*>& buffers, std::vector<std::ofstream*>& buckets, bool force, int i );
00130   void _flushWriteBuffers( std::vector<std::stringstream*>& buffers, std::vector<std::ofstream*>& buckets, bool force );
00131   void _closeWriteBuckets( std::vector<std::stringstream*>& buffers, std::vector<std::ofstream*>& buckets );
00132   void _openReadBuckets( std::vector<std::ifstream*>& buckets, const std::string& path, int bins );
00133   void _readDocBucket( UrlEntryTable& urlTable, std::ifstream& docIn );
00134 
00135   int hashString( const char* str );
00136   void hashToBuckets( std::ifstream& in, const std::string& path );
00137   void createBuckets( const std::string& tmpPath );
00138   void closeBuckets();
00139   void combineBucket( const std::string& outputPath, const std::string& tmpPath, int bucket );
00140   void hashToBuckets( const std::string& inputPath );
00141   void combineRedirectDestinationBucket( const std::string& tmpPath, int i, std::vector<std::stringstream*>& outBuffers, std::vector<std::ofstream*>& outputFiles );
00142 
00143 public:
00144   Combiner( int bins = 10 ) : _bins(bins) {}
00145 
00146   void combineRedirectDestinationBuckets( const std::string& tmpPath );
00147   void combineBuckets( const std::string& outputPath, const std::string& tmpPath );

00149   void hashToBuckets( const std::string& bucketPath, const std::string& inputPath );
00150   void sortCorpusFiles( const std::string& outputPath, const std::string& preSortPath, const std::string& inputPath );
